Generation III.Ruby: Sableye lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these Pok é mon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
Generation III.Sapphire: Sableye digs the ground with sharpened claws to find rocks that it eats. Substances in the eaten rocks crystallize and rise up to the Pok é mon 's body surface.
Generation III.Emerald: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food--raw gems. A Sableye lurks in darkness and is seen only rarely.
Generation III.FireRed: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.

Generation IV.Diamond: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation IV.Pearl: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation IV.Platinum: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.

Generation V.Black: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation V.White: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation V.Black 2: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation V.White 2: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.

Generation VI.X: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation VI.Y: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Sableye lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these Pokémon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Sableye digs the ground with sharpened claws to find rocks that it eats. Substances in the eaten rocks crystallize and rise up to the Pokémon's body surface.

Generation VII.Sun: The jewel from its chest, which has grown gigantic due to the effects of Mega Evolution, can turn back any attack.
Generation VII.Moon: Supporting a giant heavy jewel, it can't change direction very nimbly and is vulnerable to attack from behind.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Bathed in the energy of Mega Evolution, the gemstone on its chest expands, rips through its skin, and falls out.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It blocks any and all attacks with its giant-sized gemstone. However, the stone's a heavy burden, and it limits Mega Sableye's movements.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon is feared. When its gemstone eyes begin to glow with a sinister shine, it's believed that Sableye will steal people's spirits away.
Generation VIII.Shield: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
Generation IX.Violet: Materials from gems it has eaten float to the surface of its body and can form an infinite number of patterns among individuals.

Generation V.White 2: Trade with Curtis in Nimbasa City (female player character only)

Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Ten Carat Hill , Vast Poni Canyon ( SOS Battle )
